title: Indriyati ATMOSUKARTO | Web Directory | Singapore Institute of Technology

meta.description: Dr Indri Atmosukarto is an Associate Professor at the Singapore Institute of Technology. She is currently the Deputy Cluster Director of the InfoComm Technology (ICT) cluster. Indri is a member of the  SIT Data Science and AI Lab (DSAIL) and the SIT Systems Section (S3) . Prior to joining SIT in 2014, Indri was a Research Scientist at the Illinois Advanced Research Center (iARCS) (previously known as ADSC) leading the 'Semantic Analysis of Video' project. Indri holds a PhD in Computer Science and Engineering from the University of Washington, and was a Postdoctoral Senior Fellow working at the Seattle Children's Research Institute.  Indri is a Senior Member of IEEE and has been the principle investigator of several research projects in SIT. Her research interest are in computer vision, machine learning/deep learning, and medical imaging.

text_lines: This question is for testing whether or not you are a human visitor and to prevent automated spam submissions.
PhD (Computer Science), University of Washington, United States

Dr Indri Atmosukarto is an Associate Professor at the Singapore Institute of Technology. She is currently the Deputy Cluster Director of the InfoComm Technology (ICT) cluster. Indri is a member of the
SIT Data Science and AI Lab (DSAIL)
. Prior to joining SIT in 2014, Indri was a Research Scientist at the Illinois Advanced Research Center (iARCS) (previously known as ADSC) leading the '

' project. Indri holds a PhD in Computer Science and Engineering from the University of Washington, and was a Postdoctoral Senior Fellow working at the Seattle Children's Research Institute.  Indri is a Senior Member of IEEE and has been the principle investigator of several research projects in SIT. Her research interest are in computer vision, machine learning/deep learning, and medical imaging.
